_header: When God was born of Mary free
_description: A carol for Innocents’ Day — two macaronic 5-line stanzas and 4-line Latin burden: ‘Psallite gaudentes / Infantum festa colentes’ (repeated)

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
When god as born of mary freHerode the kyng of
                    galalee…
BLAdd5665.Note: MS omits the repeated short line (lines 4-5) in stanza 2.
